name: 19th International Conference on Pharmaceutics & Novel Drug Delivery Systems
content: Pharmaceutica Meet 2020 cordially invites each and every interested and enthusiastic participant from all over the world to take part in the 19th International Conference on Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems at Dubai, UAE during April 27-28, 2020\. Dubai, UAE is a highly notable conference throughout the world organized by ME Conferences. The main aim of this conference is to find novel opportunities of doing NDDS research and dynamically providing the “value addition” to pharmaceutical R&D businesses which is used to treat major diseases. This conference accompany with leading oncologists, doctors, scientists, academicians, specialists from all over the world to share ideas and advance techniques in novel drug delivery system . This conference includes a Keynote presentations, Oral talks, Poster presentations, Symposia, Workshops, Exhibitions and Career development programs.
